DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether propofol base total intravenous anesthesia reduces incidence acute kidney injury follow lung transplantation extracorporeal membrane oxygenation
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Propofol Based Total Intravenous Anesthesia Sevoflurane Based Balanced Anesthesia Renal Protection During Lung Transplantation Under Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation - A Prospective , Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: Sixty adult undergo lung transplantation extracorporeal membrane oxygenation Patient propofol allergy , BMI > 30 kg/m2
